name: Ontology
introduce: Ontology is a public blockchain bringing decentralized identity and data solutions to Web 3.0. Its open-source network provides a platform for smart contract creation and decentralized application deployment. The project is concentrated on facilitating self-sovereign identification (ID) and data management.Ontology features a two-token system. ONT enables holders to contribute to the network's security mechanism and participate in governance decisions, while ONG is used to pay transaction fees.Ontology's mainnet officially launched in June 2018.
